dt-api.name: cell().deselect()

type.returns: API instance that contains a reference to the deselected cell.
type.description: Deselect a single cell in the table, based on the cell found by the `dt-api cell()` method.

dt-api.description: This method simply deselects a single cell that has been found by the `dt-api cell()` selector method.

example.title: Deselect all cells on the current page

dt-api.example:
var table = new DataTable('#myTable');
table.cell({ page: 'current' }).deselect();
